page.title: 05EATING HABITS IN STRACHAN
page.content: Of the 40 families who answered our questions we drew up these conclusions. { Meat}is preferred to{fish.}9 out of 10 people eat meat more than twice a week. Half the families eat a traditional 2 or 3 course{Sunday lunch. Only 1 in 10 is a{vegetarian.} Most familes{bake at home}and about 1/2 eat{cakes or desserts}every day. {Cereals}are preferred to{cooked {breakfasts}and most eat some{high {fibre food}each day. Although 1/2 the people eat some meals in front of the T.V. nearly all eat together as a family whenever possible {Tea}is preferred to{coffee}and 1 person is on a{diet.
